issue.title: GUI/Overlay to Gazebo to help with debug

content.raw: Oh yeah absolutely. I finished up my other PR’s and I didn’t see the Docker issue posted yet, so I just wanted to keep working. @{5ce2e28709c5fa0fd9fb0c6c} feel free to work off of what I have or just start fresh :slight_smile: Carlos, could you please link me to the Docker issue? I don’t think I see it on the Issues page yet. Thanks!
content.html: Oh yeah absolutely. I finished up my other PR’s and I didn’t see the Docker issue posted yet, so I just wanted to keep working. @Marshall Rawson feel free to work off of what I have or just start fresh Carlos, could you please link me to the Docker issue? I don’t think I see it on the Issues page yet. Thanks!
